    • Constructor Detail

      • MessageTemplates

        public MessageTemplates​(CredentialPacket packet,
                        java.lang.Boolean type,
                        java.lang.String... files)
        Constructor of MessageTemplates.
        Parameters:
        packet - destination user
        type - type of message. If true the email will contain greetings message otherwise email will be reminder of new files
        files - Optional parameter - an array of file names to place them in content of reminder
